website_summaries.verdict: This device is sturdy, easy to use, and makes a great choice for getting the pits out of small to medium-size olives.
pros: Has locking mechanism for when not in use, making for simple storage
Is durable and made of sturdy materials
Easy to grip and use with one hand without tiring out muscles
Leaves cherries and olives intact after pitting
cons: Is better for pitting smaller olives and cherries

customer_reviews.title: Best utensil ever!
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pitter is perfect to pit cherries. I picked cherries, washed them, pitted them, put about 40 in each pint freezer container to freeze for smoothies. The cherries on our tree ripen close to the same time, too many to eat, so this works great. The pitter works great, cleans easily, stores well with the closure mechanism on it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa E.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love cherries. I hated pitting them, until I got this great tool. I ordered this item, it arrived a day early. I immediately started pitting my delicious cherries. It was so easy!! I made a scrumptious cherry puree, which I then scooped over ice cream, yum, yum, yum. Then, I came to my senses and mixed the cherries with cottage cheese and had a great snack. This is one more way to get my husband to eat more fresh fruit, because he hated dealing with the pits, buts loves cherries without the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Profriterole

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kitchen Tool - Makes Tedious Job Easy
customer_reviews.text: This product makes quick, easy work of the tedious job of pitting cherries. It is sturdy and a real kitchen tool - not a gimmick. It is weighted nicely and very easy to use. It opens to accommodate all sizes of cherries. I have not yet tried it with olives but I imagine it will work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Rabine

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small amount of cherrues
customer_reviews.text: Love cherries but hate the red hands from pitting by hand. This makes for much cleaner work. Time consuming if you have alot to pit, but fine for the average home it works great. If you want to pit a lot then I would suggest checking out the multi-pit remover. You do have to be sure the pit falls out. We dehydrated some and I have found a few where the pit did not come completely out.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: What a nifty, simple tool that works great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to take advantage of summer prices of dark sweet cherries, not only for eating but also for freezing. Flash freezing cherries is so much easier and quicker with the Cherry Pitter Stoner utensil. I like how the pitter leaves the cherry mostly intact. It is a bit more time consuming when you have a quantity of cherries, but I prefer the results better than the ones that do bulk cherries. I like the assurance of knowing that the pit has been removed. We will now enjoy cherries long past the season.
customer_reviews.author: frau4

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, functional, durable
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased the Protensils premium cherry pitter and I love it. With a couple batches of cherries or was easy albeit sightly messy but whatcha gonna do. Overall the design is economic and it successful got the seed %100 of the time going straight through the stem. Haven't tested on olives yet but after this I have no doubts. Cherry and olive lovers won't regret
customer_reviews.author: Mekkor

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy, durable, no plastic
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was looking for non plastic study pitter, this has worked great so far, takes a little bit longer then a plastic multiple pitter but hey no plastic waste for Earth of it breaks. I have lbs of cherries I have been putting, definitely doesn't take as long as I thought and my kids love to help! One bowl for pitted and one bowl for the pits. Hope this last a lifetime like products used to So tired of wasteful cheap products
customer_reviews.author: ajgb22

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Needed this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think of ordering this before, but WOW! Once you have this you won't go back! We just pitted 5 gallons of wild cherry plums. I thought that the harder cherry plums might cause aching hands but this well-designed tool was comfortable and required little effort. Popped it into the dishwasher and it came out clean. Cherry plums are slightly bigger then cherries and it worked perfectly. Note, we did get cherry plum juice all over the counter, but not a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: debwillow

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm a massive fan of olives and have recently learned that they have a lot more flavor if they haven't been pitted prior to brining. Oh my god it's true. So I bought this! I pitted about a cup of kalamata olives in just a few minutes, easy as pie. Love this tool - it's going to get a LOT of use.
customer_reviews.author: gillian pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm picky with hand tools and that translates to kitchen utensils. I've been baking a lot of cherry pies during COVID SIP, and got tired of using a boba straw to push the pits out of cherries, or a knife to slowly remove them. I looked at the numerous plastic options on here and just wasn't a fan of any of them, seemed too cheap/poorly made. I took a risk on this item, and it's great! Sturdy, hidden spring mechanism making use a breeze, high polish chrome finish, no slop in the hinge. One pie down and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: cheap rivet comes loose immediately
customer_reviews.text: rivet loosened up after one use. Returned it. If you look down the reviews, you'll find pictures of a different tool under the same item name. At any rate, don't buy one that looks like a pliers with a cup on one end and thin tube on the other.
customer_reviews.author: dmm1

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I used this for olives and it seems you lose a lot of the olive meat. It's a bit tense to use, don't use your stomach as leverage or you might get a nasty pinch bruise. I'm going to keep looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: ksfreedom

customer_reviews.title: Solid - great feel and design
customer_reviews.text: This product takes me back to my childhood, when we pitted cherries for a Sunday cake or for canning. There is only one way to do it, one cherry at a time. This item is made well, has some substance to it, well-designed and of good quality. I am glad I found the YouTensil brand and will be looking for more kitchen gadgets from them.
customer_reviews.author: CHRATCAL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed to find out it was made of plastic. I'm concerned about it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Cherbert

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Product: Was tired of the time needed to manually pit cherries so purchased this. It feels well made and works like a dream allowing me to pit probably a dozen cherries in the time I would spend pushing out a pit with a chopstick. Much less mess as well although still a little messy. Shipper: Item arrived packed well and on time.
customer_reviews.author: BillC

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know this was something I wanted or needed but I love it. It works. Only gave it 4 stars because it is a little messy - it looks like some of the other ones have a way to catch the juice - but I like the way this one looks better.
customer_reviews.author: tantan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally ordered this tool. I love cherries but hate eating around the pit. As soon as the tool arrived I pitted the cherries I had on hand and it was so nice to just pop them in my mouth. This tool works well and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Momsully

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: You should buy this! It makes eating and preparing cherries so much easier. This works well and effortlessly. I loved it so much I bought my mom one too. No more red fingers or stain under your nails!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: I like its sturdy feel and compact size. I fits nicely in my drawer with the various other tool I have and it doesn't catch on everything. It is easy to clean and use. Best of all: it works to pit cherries! I'd recommend it as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hillier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Dislike the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and works well. The only problem is that the packaging is Styrofoam and that is not biodegradable and unrecyclable. If there is another option, I believe that it would be more beneficial for the overall carbon footprint in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for pitting cherries. Impressed by the value for the price. Sturdy product, latch on the back of the handle to keep it shut when stored. Riveted hinge. Spaced far enough apart when closed that it did not smash the cherries. Washed and dried immediately after use. Feels like it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KevinA

customer_reviews.title: Not a Clean Pit
customer_reviews.text: Not 100 percent happy with this item, really doesn't work like the one it replace, doesn't seem to give a clean Cherry or Olive, kind of mashes them.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas Record Collector

customer_reviews.title: Awkward starting position for even large hands
customer_reviews.text: Starting position is much to wide. Have to use two hand to close to being grip size. Makes use awkward if it goes to full open. Otherwise works like a charm and appears very solid
customer_reviews.author: Fe26

customer_reviews.title: Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this YEARS ago. It is very high quality and easy to use. It pits the cherries perfectly every time. I would definitely recommend, this is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Useful gadget
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy tool. Went cherry picking and we got carried away! Needless to say, taking the pit out of hundreds of cherries by hand was not my weekend plan, but this little tool made it easier. The pits will fly way sometimes but that’s nothing to do with the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.text: Just pitted 2 lbs of fresh cherries for a cherry crisp & it was quick & easy. I love to bake with fresh cherries so this tool will get quite the workout. So far, I love it & wish I’d bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I’d like us to do fresh cherry pies with the pedal reminds me of when I was a young girl going to my aunts farm and we would do them by hand then she discovered this one time I love this so easy keeps the cherries hall no Mas best $10 I’ve ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Works great but design could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quaity, sturdy pitter. I bought it to pit olives specifically and found my hands slipped on the handle. These would have worked perfectly if there the handles had some type of gripper material.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pitter. Big improvement over my last one. Just have to be careful with the splatter containment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pitting large quantifies of cherries
customer_reviews.text: I pre-ordered 20 pounds of tart cherries for jam, and looked around for a better cherry pitter than the one I had. Found this one, and it is GREAT. Easy to use and really fast. Design is great for my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: lwg

customer_reviews.title: Great cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the cherry pitter. Substantial weight. Easy to use. Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle M Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Not the Pits
customer_reviews.text: I never even knew a cherry pitter existed until I read a food blog recently. Glad I picked this one to buy. It works great in removing pits. Try it on olives too!
customer_reviews.author: eyewonit

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find one made of metal and this one was perfect! It is very sturdy and strong, feels like it will last a lifetime. Very easy to use as well. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wow OK the pitter itself is great but the follow up email upon delivery noting "use ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow OK the pitter itself is great but the follow up email upon delivery noting "use suggestions and tips" with recipe ideas was a very thoughtful customer service touch point! Kudos to the marketing team on customer care and now I am off to happily pit cherries ...

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This works great to pit cherries quickly which is important if you have 7 grandchildren all wanting berries for lunch when they come to visit!
customer_reviews.author: sewing gramme

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Worked great on removing the pits from ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Worked great on removing the pits from the cherry. Made my time faster to get the cherry pie into the oven. Less messy. Love it. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Maria RSC

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pitter is quite sturdy and should last for years. It was easy to use and not at all hard to clean. Cherries are naturally messy to clean. This speeds up the process and makes eating cherries for kids a lot safer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Koller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical tool
customer_reviews.text: Iam very please , makes the job so much easier Thank yoi

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My 3 year old grandson pitted his Cherries

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Really well made. Couldn’t ask for any improvements.

customer_reviews.title: Cherry pitter.
customer_reviews.text: Works as should and seems to be heavy duty. Looks and works good.

customer_reviews.title: very nice and solid product
customer_reviews.text: This item works great even on very small wild cherries

customer_reviews.title: Well made cherry/ olive pitter
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdily made; makes work easy and efficient. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matureone

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cherry pitter when I was making a cherry pie. I was impressed at how easy it pitted the cherries, saving almost all the cherry. Easy to clean and feels very sturdy. Affordable price, too. I also like the closing fastener for storage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool
customer_reviews.text: Work surprisingly well, easy to use. Good design and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Great cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.text: A great little cherry pitter. Easy to use and makes removing pitts so much faster! Wish I’d bought one sooner.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT know a tool like this existed!! Happy to have one in my tool shed ...

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I don't have anything to compare it with but it did the job. Except for the really large cherry pits wouldn't fit through the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get the put out very cleanly, and often I’m still using my fingers.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent with large olives but, with small and soft does not work well
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Brizuela

customer_reviews.title: NOT the pits! It’s the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing. I can’t believe I have lasted this long without it. It is very solidly made and pits cherries quickly and easily. Get one!

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is item is simple, well-made and sturdy. A good design.

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked how good this is for so cheap. It feels pretty solid so I’m sure I’ll never need to replace this unless I lose it. My only complaint is that it’s difficult to hold open all the way since my hands are kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W

customer_reviews.title: Olives?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tool mostly to pit olives. Will not pit a sevillano olive, the pit does not fit through the hole so it just smashes the olive
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.text: It is called a cherry pitter so that is what I did with it......pitted cherries. It is very easy to use and also easy to clean. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joan b

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Cherry Pitter
customer_reviews.text: I'll say it again, its the perfect cherry pitter. Design is smooth and flawless. Pitted a lb.of cherries in about 5 minutes. Want to buy more cherries just so I can pit them!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of time, but even with careful placement 5-10% of the time the pit hangs on the skin and has to be removed manually.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pierce
customer_reviews.text: Can I pierce your cherry? I'm kidding. This looks like a an ear piercing tool. For the actual Chery fruit It gets the job done, just make sure the pit really did come out.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Sustaita

customer_reviews.title: Great Pitter!
customer_reviews.text: This pitter is easy to use, has good fit and feel in your hand. Sturdy construction, it will last a long, ling time. Can be used for cherries and olives. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I use it to remove the stone from dried dates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pitter/stoner to remove the pit in small, dry Chinese red dates when herbal soup recipes call for them. Because of the small size of the stone, some flesh fibers remain attached to the stone. Not perfect, but by and large, the tool does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: BeMore

customer_reviews.title: This cherry pitter works great! Took me a few tries to learn how ...
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pitter works great! Took me a few tries to learn how much force to use so that I pit the cherry without mangling it, but once I figured that out, it works really well and is easy to use! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for small plums, too.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove stones from small plums off our tree. It worked well and made the job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnettina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and pretty handy, but it sometimes mangles the olives a little. Haven't tried it for cherries yet.
customer_reviews.author: TBT

customer_reviews.title: Well, I made a crumble
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a pitter before but this thing made it quick and easy to make my cherry crumble. The seller sent a pretty awesome follow-up email with tips for its use and for some cherry recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Scott

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for large olives
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really work for big olives, ends up smashing them before they get pitted. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the design
customer_reviews.text: This cherry pitter rips the cherries when taking out the pits. My older pitter was kinder to the fruit when removing the pits.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cherry Dessert Baking!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but equally easy to use. Made cherry bread which I would never try without this tool.

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy tool that works extremely well for pitting Kalamata olives! Highly recommended to anyone who wants to do the same. Clearly a durable piece of kitchenware - glad I got myself one of these.

customer_reviews.title: Quality 😊

customer_reviews.text: The cherry pitter does its job, it's not fragile like some (expensive) pitters I've had, and is quite attractive.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, glad I went with this one instead of the lesser priced ones
customer_reviews.author: GmaB

customer_reviews.title: Not overwhelmed.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this pitter, I was initially thrilled with how clean the presentation was. It looks solid and well made. But as I was testing this, I found flaws with it right away. The rivet used to hold the two sides together is flimsy and this allows the handles to move laterally to the intended movement, causing the handles to jam the closed position. If the rivet was stronger, this would be a much nicer cherry pitter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice product for Pitting cherries. No complains
customer_reviews.author: jagadish Kurma

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pitter!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tool. It is made of sturdy metal, is easy to grasp, is comfortable to hold, and makes pitting cherries a breeze!! I read all of the reviews on several pitters and this one seemed to have the best. I'm sooo glad I bought it. I love cherries and, for quite a while, have wanted to make cherry jam and also home-can cherries; however, the pitting process was always too laborious for me. Now that I have this tool, I can jam and home-can till my heart's content!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Best cherry pitter I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a Christmas gift, but had to wait until cherries were "in season" to use it regularly. I've had several cherry pitters over the years, and the design of this one is spot on. With one squeeze, I'm able to push the stone out of the fruit (that has been washed and de-stemmed) into a bowl, and place the fruit in a second bowl. Easy as can be! The process is much faster and neater than past attempts with other products. I highly recommend this cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to remove the pits from olives and this works pretty well. This pitter is pretty heavy and is feels like it's a good quality kitchen tool and it's easy to clean. I've only used it once so far, but I like it a lot and will likely use it more in the future as we eat a lot of olives!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Lunn

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Read the good review and purchased it to pit cherries to make cherry wine. The result wasn't as expected. It took quite a chunk of the cherry flesh. Also the juice squirt out when I pitted the cherry. I ended up using stainless steel straw to pit.
customer_reviews.author: penoy19

product_meta.title: ProTensils Premium Cherry Pitter Stoner - Olive Pitter Tool Heavy Duty | Quality Finish | Includes Cherry Recipe EBOOK (Silver)
feature_bullets: SIMPLE TO USE: Easy one hand use with no hand fatigue, quickly pits cherries, no assembly required & easy to clean. Pit with comfort!
PERECT CHERRIES: Pits Cherries without bruising and wasting fruit. Ideal for Bing and Rainier Cherries as well as big or small Cherries.
DURABILITY: Professional heavy-duty designed to last for years. Made from Zinc Alloy with non-corrosive stylish finish.
